title: Replace GOB boosted farm with NEW token Banana
content:
Replace GOB boosted farm with Banana token from https://apes.cash/

  

Impact on users 

Boosted farms exist to bring new projects in our dex. Since https://apes.cash/ is a new project and seems to have a lot of value (10.000 nfts with floor price about 0.10bch its 1.000 BCH).

  

Economic impact

If we give a farm to Banana token we will be the first farm for this token which means we have a chance to generate an increased number of transactions that will result in more fees being paid and an increasing treasury. This would mean loss of about $800 liquidity of GOB boosted farm removal.
